ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger good quality silver tequila
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger melon liqueur (such as MidoriÂ®)
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger orange juice, or to taste
des: "I had something similar at a local Mexican restaurant and recreated it to the best of my knowledge at home. I figured if I had to recreate it, I could name it whatever I want, that's how I got the name!"
ins: Fill a margarita glass with crushed ice. Pour tequila, melon liqueur, and triple sec into the glass. Top with sour mix, grenadine, lime juice, and orange juice.  Garnish with the cherry and a wedge of orange.
